page.title: 15TELEVISION AND HOBBIES
page.content: {RESULTS OF SURVEY FROM A CROSS SECTION {OF THE VILLAGE OF WILLAND.(100 RETURN) -------------------------------------- HOW MANY TELEVISIONS HAS YOUR HOUSE ? 0={1%}__1={38%}__2={45%}__3={11%}__ 4+ ={5%.}( ONLY 1 HOUSE HAD NO T.V.) HOW MANY COLOURED T.V. HAS YOUR HOUSE ? 0={6.5%}__1={72%}__2={14%}__3+={7.5% HOW MANY BLACK AND WHITE T.V. HAVE YOU ? O={49%}__1={41%}__2={6.5%}__3+={2% DOES YOUR T.V. HAVE REMOTE CONTROL ? YES={44.5% }NO= {55.5% HAS YOUR T.V.GOT CEFAX ? YES={17% }NO= {82% HAS YOUR HOUSEHOLD GOT A VIDEO ? YES={25% } NO= {75% {_____________________________________ {SPORTS CLUBS IN THE VILLAGE ARE}JUDO, FOOTBALL(WILLAND ROVERS),TENNIS(FLOOD LIT COURTS),SKITTLES, DARTS,SNOOKER, BADMINTON,TABLE TENNIS AND NEW THIS YEAR INDOOR BOWLS. {
